name: pigeon
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] a large, usually grey bird that is often seen in towns sitting on buildings in large groups, and is sometimes eaten as food
rusm/E+/GettyImages
[ C ] a pigeon kept as a pet in order to take part in flying competitions: racing/homing pigeons

a large, usually gray-and-white bird that lives esp. in cities: We fed the pigeons in the park.
